fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Force someone to kneel to you at night, this person will be forced to visit you.
- Anyone you make kneel will have their visitors visit you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you die the night you complete your goal, you will lose.
- Visitors will be notified of your ability, even if they originally visited your kneel target.

fields.name: GOAL:
fields.value: Survive to see five players visit you.
